name: This Quiz is Daffy | Various Cartoon Characters | 10 Questions

questions.text: Appearing at what he believed was the Axe Handle estate to investigate a murder in "The Super Snooper", Duch Drake (Daffy Duck) refers to the female living in the house by what term?
questions.explanation:
The body.

	Unaware that he is at the wrong house accusing the wrong person of murder, Duch Drake (Daffy Duck) interrogates a woman only known as 'the body'. As he accuses her of murder, 'the body' keeps hitting on him until Duch Drake races out of the house with 'the body' right behind him. The Looney Tunes cartoon "The Super Snooper" premiered in the USA on November 1, 1952 with a running time of seven minutes.

questions.text: Bugs Bunny accompanies Daffy Duck as his side kick in the Merrie Melodies cartoon, "Drip Along Daffy".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Porky Pig is Daffy Duck's sidekick in "Drip Along Daffy" when Daffy Duck goes up against Nasty Canasta for the first time. Porky Pig saves Daffy from being killed in a duel with Nasty Canasta and becomes sheriff while Daffy Duck becomes a member of the sanitation department. This Merrie Melodies cartoon premiered in the USA for the first time on November 17, 1951 with a running time of seven minutes.

questions.text: Why did Daffy Duck need Doctor Jerkyll's help in the Looney Tunes cartoon, "The Impatient Patient"?
options: He was afraid his leg was broken
questions.explanation:
To cure his hiccups.

	While searching for a person named Chloe to give a telegram to, Daffy Duck came down with a bad case of hiccups. He went to see Doctor Jerkyll for help and was surprised to find that after drinking a potion Doctor Jerkyll turned into Chloe. Daffy Duck read the birthday telegram from Frankenstein to Chloe. The Looney Tunes cartoon "The Impatient Patient" first premiered in the USA on September 5, 1942 with a running time of eight minutes.

questions.text: Defending himself against a muscular man at the beach, how much does Daffy tell the viewing audience he weighs in the Merrie Melodies cartoon, "Muscle Tussle"?
questions.explanation:
Ten pounds.

	After a muscular man hits on Daffy Duck's girlfriend in front of him, Daffy and the muscular man challenge each other to several contests until Daffy wins the girl. "Muscle Tussle" premiered in the USA on April 18, 1953 and ran for seven minutes.

questions.text: Trying to make money with his bag of practical jokes, Daffy Duck plays Foghorn Leghorn against  Barnyard Dog. What is the first practical joke Daffy sells Foghorn Leghorn in the Merrie Melodies cartoon, "The High and the Flighty"?
questions.correct: Bone with a spring in it
questions.explanation:
Bone with a spring in it.

	After Daffy Duck watched Foghorn Leghorn and Barnyard Dog going at each other, he decided to make some money by selling each of them something from his bag of practical jokes. Daffy first sold Foghorn Leghorn a bone spring which twisted Barnyard Dog's insides into a spring. After several other jokes were played on each one of them, Foghorn Leghorn and Barnyard Dog realized Daffy Duck was playing them to make money.They turned the tables on Daffy Duck and used one of his own practical jokes against him. "The High and the Flighty" premiered in the USA on February 18, 1956 and ran six minutes and thirty-six seconds long.

questions.text: What was the name of the Indian that fell in love with Daffy Duck while he was disguised as an Indian girl in the Looney Tunes cartoon, "The Daffy Duckaroo"?
questions.explanation:
Little Beaver.

	After leaving Hollywood for the wild west, Daffy Duck fell for an Indian girl named Daisy June. When her boyfriend, Little Beaver, came to see Daisy June, Daffy Duck disguised himself as an Indian girl. Little Beaver fell in love with Daffy Duck and pursued him relentlessly. "The Daffy Duckaroo" premiered in the USA on October 24, 1942 in black and white and ran seven minutes long.

questions.text: In the Looney Tunes cartoon, "The Great Piggy Bank Robbery", which detective did Daffy Duck dream that he was?
questions.explanation:
Dick Tracy.

	After knocking himself out, Daffy Duck dreamed he was Duck Twacy (Dick Tracy) investigating a rash of piggy bank robberies. Duck Twacy discovers the thieves and chases them down eventually killing them all. When the piggy banks are discovered, Daffy Duck awakens to learn that his becoming Duck Twacy was all a dream. "The Great Piggy Bank Robbery" premiered in the USA on July 20, 1946 with a running time of seven minutes and thirty-five seconds.

questions.text: What was the name of the first cartoon in which Daffy Duck appeared?
questions.explanation:
Porky's Duck Hunt.

	Daffy Duck first appeared in the black and white Looney Tunes cartoon "Porky's Duck Hunt". The cartoon premiered in the USA on April 17, 1937 and ran for eight minutes and forty-seven seconds. While out duck hunting, Porky meets Daffy Duck. Daffy eludes Porky and his shotgun until Porky gives up and takes his dog and his gun back home.

questions.text: What was the last name of Daffy's character in the Merrie Melodies cartoon, "Rocket Squad"?
questions.explanation:
Monday.

	Daffy Duck played Detective Joe Monday to Porky Pig's Detective Schmoe Tuesday as they searched for a thief stealing flying saucers. After arresting the thief and hearing his proclamations of innocence, Joe Monday and Schmoe Tuesday are arrested for false arrest. "Rocket Squad" premiered in the USA on March 10, 1956 with a running time of six minutes and thirty-five seconds.

questions.text: In the Looney Tunes cartoon, "Dime to Retire", Daffy Duck is an innkeeper who initially charges Porky Pig how much money to stay at his inn?
questions.explanation:
Ten cents.

	Daffy Duck can afford to charge ten cents for a room at his hotel because he charges extra money to his customers for animal extermination fees. When Porky Pig leaves without paying his money, Daffy Duck holds his luggage. Porky Pig causes his luggage to explode and leaves while Daffy runs out of the inn with his tail feathers on fire. "Dime to Retire" first premiered in the USA on September 3, 1955 and ran for seven minutes.
